parameters.name: entry_d
parameters.description: A descriptor of the entry whose permissions you want to set.

parameters.name: permset_p
parameters.description: The permissions set that you want to store in the entry.

full_content:
Function: acl_set_permset
URL: https://www.qnx.com/developers/docs/7.1/com.qnx.doc.neutrino.lib_ref/topic/a/acl_set_permset.html
Synopsis: int acl_set_permset( acl_entry_t entry_d,
Headers: #include <sys/acl.h>
Parameters:
  - entry_d: A descriptor of the entry whose permissions you want to set.
  - permset_p: The permissions set that you want to store in the entry.
Examples:
Example 1:
#include <sys/acl.h>

int acl_set_permset( acl_entry_t entry_d,
                     acl_permset_t permset_p );
